page.title: 17FASHION
page.content: BOYS I like to wear fashionable shirts which are pale coloured and tight fitting. They have no collar but have a self- coloured band around the neck and the bottom of the sleeve.Sometimes I wear thin pin-striped or plain trousers or bleached jeans which are baggy and gathered around the bottoms.I like to wear either white socks or one luminous pink and one bright green or yellow one. GIRLS I like to wear baggy T-shirts and jumpers with tight split skirts and a baggy white cotton jacket.On my feet I wear plastic sandals in bright colours and white socks.If I want to look smart I wear an all-in-one flying suit made of creased cotton.I like to carry a matching plastic bag.
